name: American Police Van Driving
description:
Car games fans! Get ready to be a real cop with realistic graphics. Choose your gun and police car, start catching criminals. Download now for free!

Game Features:
• 4 Police vans
• Ultra HD Graphics
• 3 police sirens
• Getting on and off the car
• Realistic traffic pedestrian system
• Huge city
• Inside driving
• Challenging missions
• Sunny, rainy, snowy weather options

This game, which is prepared for those who love car games and police games, has been prepared completely according to your wishes. Get ready to experience the realistic police experience. Catch criminals in the city with more than 5 police vehicles and 20+ weapon options.

Complete challenging and fun missions. Buy new police cars and new weapons with the money you earn. As the police, maintain order in the city and do what is necessary to the thieves.

It's time to start your sirens. Patrol the city as you wish. Catch the drivers who do not obey the traffic rules and bring them to justice. You can control your police truck with arrow keys or steering wheel.

• If you want to see more police games, don't forget to rate our game. Have fun!
